sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.css'], }) export class RegisterComponent implements OnInit { registerForm: FormGroup; initForm() { this.registerForm = new FormGroup({ firstName: new FormControl('', Validators.required), lastName: new FormControl('', Validators.required), email: new FormControl('', [Validators.required, Validators.email]), password: new FormControl('', [ Validators.required, Validators.minLength(6), ]), }); } ngOnInit(): void { this.initForm(); } onSubmit() { console.log(this.registerForm.value); } onClear() { this.registerForm.reset(); } }

Register:
